entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RETRY_AFTER is null in Lease object in case of SlidingWindow rate limiter #52411
  • After upgrade to 8.0.0, setting AOT compilation to true breaks published Blazor app. #52410
  • Removal of index.html in .net 8 needs a migration tip for apache servers #52409
  • Flaky test ChangingUserNameDuringReconnectLogsWarning #52408
  • Flaky test: LocationChangingHandlers_CannotCancelTheNavigationAsynchronously_UntilReturning #52407
  • What Should We Expect the First Load of InteractivityWasm #52406
  • Custom state not set for OpenIdConnectProtocolValidator #52400
  • QuickGrid Samples Website crashes when scrolling all the way to the to bottom on the Remote data QuickGrid #52392
    Planning: WebUI
  • Problem providing Access Token to HttpClient in Interactive Server mode #52390
    Planning: WebUI
  • NET 8 minimal API: Error in AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 8.0.0 #52388
  • Perf improvement: mvc #52386
  • SignalR Json Protocol version upgraded to version 2 generates problems with old servers on BlazorApps #52385
  • NETSDK1082 : 'browser-wasm' #52384
  • Trying to Render HTML for a HTMX integration.. #52382

Closed

  • [Blazor] Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props is not imported by Maui apps #42348
    6.0.x
  • Support F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46773
    Backlog
  • HTTP Gone (410) In `Http.Results` APIs #52376
  • Improve DevX when working with Blazor components compiled to custom elements #50787
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: json #52378
  • Error on Blazor FileInput upload - The format of value '' is invalid #52375
  • ASP.NET Core WebAPI includes InvariantGlobalization setting in .csproj in .NET 8 but is not stated as a change. #52319
  • React SPA template is cumbersome to use when adding new API routes due to the proxy requirement #37103
    Planning: WebUI
  • Support Pointer Events in Blazor #36508
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • gRPC JSON transcoding — Fixed parsing string values into enum when provided string is not valid enum value #52402
    area-grpc, community-contribution
  • Fix deserializing null properties to Protobuf types #52398
    area-grpc

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix type name hashing when the type has multibyte characters #52316
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-minimal, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (main) #52301
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (8.0) #52300
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (7.0) #52298
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.15
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (6.0). #52260
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.26
  • [Blazor] Try to load the assembly when finding out a root component or a parameter in webassembly #52351
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Update SDK version #52405
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fixed a typo in AddDbContextCheck comment #52391
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve Blazor project template #52234
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Clean up helix retry list #52313
    needs-area-label
  • Fix enhanced form handling use defalt enctype, honor enctype and formenctype #52359
    area-blazor
  • Add HTTP Gone (410) result #52377
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, area-networking
